title: Yoga Bra with Lace Trim, Womens Seamless Wireless Bra, with Removable Pads
features: ☸ 【High Quality Material】: These lace bras are made of 94% nylon + 6% spandex. Breathable and comfortable, good for the skin and say good bye to discomfort , pinching , itching & Scratching .
☸ 【Multiple Features】: Removable soft padded cups and seamless design. These lace overlay bras are smooth, stretchy and moisture-wicking, fully cover your breast and offer you the best protection.

☸ 【Seamless and No Buckle】:Moisture-wicking performance moves perspiration away from the skin to dry quickly on the surface. Soft, seamless construction feels ultra smooth, built for medium-impact activity and all-day comfort.
☸ 【Good Stretch】: Wide elastic straps will never slide from shoulders and no need to adjust them. Banded under bust to keep things in place. Great for home use and public.

☸ 【Widely Use】Idea for exercising, weight training, or any sport. It's also a great lounging, yoga or leisure and sleep bra too. For care:We suggest to remove cups and wash cool,Machine Wash (Hand Wash Recommended).
description: ☸ Package includes:1/2/3 Pack of Bras  Non-wired no buckle seamless with wide straps, so it can be use as a sleep in bra or just everyday bra, It is also perfect for after surgery or during and after pregnancy.  This sleep bra has great elastic that will fit not only small women but also large bust women and girls with no tightness.  These wire free lace sleep bras are stylish and perfect for yoga, sports, working, sleeping, everyday wear and other occasions.  Full-Coverage Lace Overlay Sports Bra is very versatile - perfect as every day bra and sports bra. This seamless bra is breathable and comfortable, smooth and stretchy.  Medium-Support Fitness Wire-free Sport Bra is ultra soft and supportive, it's stretchy and allows for full movement while wear it.  Wide elastic straps will never slide from shoulders and no need to adjust them. Banded under bust to keep things in place. Great for home use and public.  Knitted wide support band helps add lift and support. Comfort straps stay put all day long  Constructed with our everlasting comfort stretch fabric. Fabric: 96% Nylon, 4% Spandex  Luxurious sleeping, yoga, sports, jogging and general exercise bra. Machine washable  Magic pouch accommodates removable modesty pads for extra lift and coverage
